sub-events.comment: If the player is above the scroll position, scroll up to the player's position.

As we are scrolling, if the top of the screen has reached the position of the next platform to create, create it at a position across the top of the screen. Then also set another platform to be created at a distance Space up again,Andadd 1to Platform count

Generating candies Randomly for every random(2,5) gap.

If platform no divisable by no(5to1) generate the same no pattern
